body:

the problem is that -o must be close to the file, ie
bcc32 -q -O2 -H -c -D_WIN32 -DNDEBUG -D_CONSOLE -D_MBCS -Isrc\common -c -osr
c\cv\mgflib\3ds2mgf.obj src\cv\mgflib\3ds2mgf.c


but i dont know where change it
